name: Queple Cave Entrance
description: You climb through the opening of the cave to find a twisting series of paths to take. You can hear creatures scuttling along the walls and the sound of rushing water echoing in the distance.

name: Pentlandite Mine
description: You find a large opening in the cave, the walls glitter with a bright metallic yellow-brown. It seems to be a motherlode of pentlandite!

name: Tin Mine
description: The cave opens into a large cavern full of crystalic ore. It looks like a tin motherlode!

name: Queple Cave Smithy
description: At the end of the cavern you see a glowing red light. You step through the opening to see a completely functioning smithy!

name: Grumpy's Gnome Home
description: You find a round wooden door at the end of a particularly long cave tunnel. It appears to be the home of an angry gnome.

name: Queple Cave River
description: The sound of flowing water fills the chamber as you step into a large cavern. A river flows gently by, teeming with fish.

name: Stone Door
description: The cavern ends abruptly with a large stone door blocking the way forward. There is an inscription on the door. You'd need to be quite strong to open it.

buildings.name: Queple's Tomb
buildings.description: The walls of the room are lit with a iridescent purple glow. A massive sarcophagus runs along the length of the room. A very large sword sits leaning against the side closest to you.
